评论概述: Nice shirt, feel is a little off
评论详情: I'm 5'6.5", 38" bust, 36" waist and I ordered Medium. Depending on material and style I usually have M or L.  This fit fine, not too tight around the middle so Medium will do especially since being 100% polyester it won't shrink.  There is ever so slight of a round curve at the bottom, so not straight but definitely not a tunic or long. The material is ok, but it has these kind of dot designs all over which to me make it have a little of an "off" feel, but I may get use to it. I originally thought it was just in the chest area shaped into a half diamond, but it is all over the material.  The sleeves are different but a nice style and coverage with a little ruffle end.
Fit is perfect, I am 5"2'  172 lbs & bought the LG size. It says to was in cool water, which I plan to do.
Love the shirt.

I’ve worn it to work and to a baby shower. It’s very versatile and comfortable.  It's made of a lightweight material and washes up nicely.

Top is pretty but I really wish descriptions and instructions were consistent. The tag on the shirt says machine wash and tumble dry low. Here on Amazon it says HAND WASH ONLY. 评论概述: Summer Ruffle Short Sleeve Crewneck Blouse
评论详情: Summer Ruffle Short Sleeve Crewneck Blouse is trendy and versatile.  The incorporation of ruffles adds a touch of elegance and femininity to the design.  The short sleeves are perfect for warmer weather, allowing for breathability while still providing arm coverage.

I recently received the top that is shown above and I have some thoughts on it to share. The design of the top includes ruffle sleeves, a crewneck, and Swiss dots, which are supposed to be feminine and versatile. The color of the top is beautifully deep, just as it appears in the pictures. However, the fabric is a bit too thick for me, making it less useful for hot weather. Additionally, it's cut looser than I expected, which makes it feel baggy rather than elegantly loose.  The top looks great with leggings and jeans, but it might only flatter certain body shapes. Due to its delicate details, it requires careful washing, which raises questions about its durability over time. While it comes in nice colors, its practicality for summer and overall durability could be improved. It's a decent choice, but there are some drawbacks to consider.

评论概述: Pretty but not for my build
评论详情: This shirt runs a bit wide (too wide for my build) and the fabric will make me sweat in the summer months. I noticed the color is not as deep or rich as the wine color in the product description photos. The sleeves are lovely, and the raised dotted design is a nice added touch. The shirt is lightweight and slightly sheer. In all, it’s just not something I will wear.
The red is a beautiful, rich color as pictured, but I usually wear a Small, and it was quite a bit large on me. I had to return.

This shirt is the perfect spring work top. I love the cute swiss dots. The sleeves have small criss-cross ruffles that add feminine and classy details. The blue is such a beautiful periwinkle kind of color. I'm 5'2, slim, and ordered a small. It was the perfect fit! I have ordered lots of things from the Pretty Garden brand lately, and haven't been disappointed yet. You can't go wrong with this top!

评论概述: Very lightweight, but not see through. No stretch
评论详情: I like this shirt, but not as crazy about it as I thought I would be. The material is lightweight but not see-through (at least with the black shirt). I like the pattern and feel the raised dots give it a little more subtle detail. The sleeves are as pictured, but it's not very flattering on me and my chubby arms. I also find the shape to be a little too boxy for my taste. I know this shirt would look great on the right body type but not on my chubby figure.

This short-sleeve shirt looks so cute on. I love the details of the ruffles on the sleeves and the dots covering the shirt. I ordered the Army Green and love the deep, rich color. I would definitely recommend this blouse.
Very lovely and loose fitted top.  I got this for work and its perfect. Its lightweight and breezy, also very comfortable.
My wife says this top hides her stomach and looks nice. The dots add visual interest, and the fit is flattering.

Item comes packaged in a plastic bag.  The material is very thin and light.  We purchased a size small for my daughter, who is 5'0".  Lengthwise, it looks good, but the scoop neck is a little wide.  She struggles to hide her bra straps, and has chosen to wear a dark sports bra under it.  The ruffle sleeves are cute and she finds it comfortable to wear.
This blouse is very cute. It fits true to size. I like the sleeves but wish the neckline was V neck.

This is a very cute top. It is great for casual wear or you can dress it up for business casual at the office. I am in love with the Swiss dot pattern lately, I think it brings a little extra to a basic top. I got an xl and I think it fits a little big but for me I'm ok with that.

评论概述: Beautiful summer blouse with Swiss dots.?
评论详情: My wife loves this comfortable summer blouse. It looks great, and the material has a great feel to it. Those Swiss dots give it a distinctive look. The sleeves are not tight and have dual hanging ruffles.

This shirt has lots of features that I like; the material has the cute swiss dots which add texture. The sleaves have small ruffles which are feminine without being over the top; and the blue is such a beautiful color! The shirt is quite long so I will have to tuck it in which I don't normally do. I ordered XL which is the size I usually wear and it fit well.

This blouse is more beautiful in person than in the stock photos. In the stock photos the blouse looks like it has mini pom-poms, but it doesn't. The blouse has small stitched flowers and is pretty. The sleeves are slightly too fluffy but I would still purchase if I saw in a local store. The color is a dark moss that matches a lush forrest ground, a very earthy color. If gold tones are prettier on you compared to silver tones, this blouse pairs beautifully with gold tones.

This blouse feels good on! It is lightweight and comfortable as well as fits true to size. There is ample roominess at the bust, hemline area and arms. Overall, it feels airy and unbinding, yet not unflattering or matronly.  I really like the subdued blue color, too. I can see me wearing this with jeans, dress pants and skirts!

A cross between olive green and brown, this color is most flattering.  Went with small and it fits perfectly. The shoulder line is spot on and the ruffle sleeves are flattering to all arms.  Have two other blouses in this fabric. I prefer to hand wash. They dry super quick. Light touch up iron as needed.  Recommend!

I like this brand a lot and this product did not disappoint!  The fabric is very nice and I like the swiss dots as it gives nice interest.  All stitching is well done.  With so many V-necks available right now, a scoop neck is refreshing.  Oh, and the sleeves - I love them!
I love the vibrant color of this shirt, but the material is a little scratchy. I chose my typical size and it fit perfectly. Still, it is cute so I will wear it out.

I love the sleeve style that’s popular now. The design is fun and unique. I ordered it in green which also sets the shirt apart a bit. The shirt is true to size, so order your typical size and you should be fine.

PRETTYGARDEN Women's Tops 2024 Summer Ruffle Short Sleeve Crewneck Blouses Swiss Dots Solid Loose Tunics Work Shirts (Army Green, Large)- pretty, and a little bit dressier top. No stretch to it at all but certainly is attractive with a nice weave to it.

This cute summer blouse is very pretty with the swiss dots design. It is lightweight and breathable, very well made. A flattering good fit that falls nicely. Goes well with any pants or jeans. Can be casual wear or even formal if dressed under a suit. It washes well and need no ironing at all.
